name: schedule
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flixbus.
Tool description: A service that provides flixbus travel search, available cities, stations, timetables and routes. Site: www.flixbus.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
API description: Fetches the schedule information for a given station using the flixbus API.

station_id.description: The ID of the station for which to retrieve the schedule.
